original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhim bhaṇḍitvā kupitā anatta manāḥ evam vadeti

original: “buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi.
analyzed: buddham paccācikkhāmi dhammam paccācikkhāmi saṅgham paccācikkhāmi sikkham paccācikkhāmi

original: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī”ti.
analyzed: kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yāḥ samaṇiyaḥ sakyadhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kupitā anatta manāḥ evam vakkhati

original: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’”ti …pe…
analyzed: kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yāḥ samaṇiyaḥ sakyadhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanāḥ evam vadeti

original: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’”ti?
analyzed: kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yāḥ samaṇiyaḥ sakyadhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanāḥ evam vakkhati

original: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’ti.
analyzed: kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yāḥ samaṇiyaḥ sakyadhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeyya—
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanāḥ evam vadeyya

original: ‘buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi.
analyzed: buddham paccācikkhāmi dhammam paccācikkhāmi saṅgham paccācikkhāmi sikkham paccācikkhāmi

original: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro. Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā
analyzed: kinnumāva samaṇiyaḥ yā samaṇiyaḥ sakyadhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā
sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti
sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evam assa vacanīyā

original: ‘māyye, kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca— buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi,
analyzed: māyye kupitā anatta manāḥ evam avaca buddham paccācikkhāmi dhammam paccācikkhāmi

original: saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi. Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro.
analyzed: saṅgham paccācikkhāmi sikkham paccācikkhāmi kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yā samaṇiyaḥ sakya dhītaro

original: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ
analyzed: santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike

original: carissāmīti, abhiramāyye, svākkhāto dhammo; cara brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’ti.
analyzed: carissāmi iti abhiramāyye su ākkhātaḥ dhammaḥ cara brahmacariyam sammā dukkhassa anta kiriyāya ati

original: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: evam ca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tathā iva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
analyzed: no ce paṭinissajjeyya ayam pi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakam dhammam āpannā nissāraṇīyam saṅgha ādisesam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
an abhiraddhā āhata cittā khila jātā

original: “buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi …pe… sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi. Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo
analyzed: buddham paccācikkhāmi pe sikkham paccācikkhāmi kinnumā va samaṇiyaḥ yā samaṇiyaḥ

original: sakyadhītaro. Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike
analyzed: sakya dhītaro santaññā api samaṇiyaḥ lajjiniyaḥ kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike

original: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
analyzed: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā
māyye kupitā anatta manāḥ evam avaca

original: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’ti.

original: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’ti.
analyzed: santaññā api samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti
cara brahmacariyam sammā dukkhassa anta kiriyāya ati

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanāḥ evam vadeti

original: ‘buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmi.
analyzed: buddham paccācikkhāmi dhammam paccācikkhāmi saṅgham paccācikkhāmi sikkham paccācikkhāmi

original: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’ti.
analyzed: santaññā api samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanāḥ evam vadeti

original: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṁ santike brahmacariyaṁ carissāmī’ti.
analyzed: santaññā api samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhā kāmā tāsā aham santike brahmacariyam carissāmi iti

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;

original: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
